title: Stop grouping Emails, waiting for a fix
content: I am still waiting fr a fix to this problem, emails are grouped in the inbox and the option to set them as un-grouped does not exist
creator: carl4849

title: Am receiving incoming emails but am unable to read them.
content:
After listing incoming emails the following message is displayed: " The account ******.net.au is being processed. Please wait until processing is complete. But it never completes! A steady blue line appears on the right side of the bottom line while on the bottom line on the left is the message 'No emails to download".

Another message encountered: Sending of password for user ******@******..com did not succeed. Mail server mail6.hosting platform.com responded Maximum number of connections from user+lp exceeds (mail.max userip.connections=3)

Finally to close Thunderbird by pressing pressing the "X" in the top right corner doesn't work - have to shut down the computer.

I'm thinking the best solution may be to reinstall Thunderbird provided existing emails will not be lost, and help will be appreciated.
creator: MurfOscar
